rtc.clientÂ =Â AgoraRTC.createClient({Â mode:Â "rtc",Â codec:Â "vp8"Â });

rtc.client.on("user-published",Â asyncÂ (user,Â mediaType)Â =>Â {
Â Â awaitÂ rtc.client.subscribe(user,Â mediaType);
Â Â console.log("subscribeÂ success");

Â Â ifÂ (mediaTypeÂ ===Â "video")Â {
Â Â Â Â constÂ remoteVideoTrackÂ =Â user.videoTrack;
Â Â Â Â constÂ remotePlayerContainerÂ =Â document.createElement("div");
Â Â Â Â remotePlayerContainer.idÂ =Â user.uid.toString();
Â Â Â Â remotePlayerContainer.textContentÂ =Â "RemoteÂ userÂ "Â +Â user.uid.toString();
Â Â Â Â remotePlayerContainer.style.widthÂ =Â "640px";
Â Â Â Â remotePlayerContainer.style.heightÂ =Â "480px";
Â Â Â Â document.body.append(remotePlayerContainer);
Â Â Â Â remoteVideoTrack.play(remotePlayerContainer);
Â Â }

Â Â ifÂ (mediaTypeÂ ===Â "audio")Â {
Â Â Â Â constÂ remoteAudioTrackÂ =Â user.audioTrack;
Â Â Â Â remoteAudioTrack.play();
Â Â }

Â Â rtc.client.on("user-unpublished",Â (user)Â =>Â {
Â Â Â Â constÂ remotePlayerContainerÂ =Â document.getElementById(user.uid);
Â Â Â Â remotePlayerContainer.remove();
Â Â });
});

//Â åŠ å…¥é€šè¯
constÂ handleJoinÂ =Â asyncÂ ()Â =>Â {
Â Â awaitÂ rtc.client.join(
Â Â Â Â options.appId,
Â Â Â Â options.channel,
Â Â Â Â options.token,
Â Â Â Â options.uid
Â Â );
Â Â rtc.localAudioTrackÂ =Â awaitÂ AgoraRTC.createMicrophoneAudioTrack();
Â Â rtc.localVideoTrackÂ =Â awaitÂ AgoraRTC.createCameraVideoTrack();
Â Â awaitÂ rtc.client.publish([rtc.localAudioTrack,Â rtc.localVideoTrack]);
Â Â constÂ localPlayerContainerÂ =Â document.createElement("div");
Â Â localPlayerContainer.idÂ =Â options.uid;
Â Â localPlayerContainer.textContentÂ =Â "LocalÂ userÂ "Â +Â options.uid;
Â Â localPlayerContainer.style.widthÂ =Â "640px";
Â Â localPlayerContainer.style.heightÂ =Â "480px";
Â Â document.body.append(localPlayerContainer);
Â Â rtc.localVideoTrack.play(localPlayerContainer);
Â Â console.log("publishÂ success!");
};
//Â ç¦»å¼€é€šè¯
constÂ handleLeaveÂ =Â asyncÂ ()Â =>Â {
Â Â rtc.localAudioTrack.close();
Â Â rtc.localVideoTrack.close();
Â Â rtc.client.remoteUsers.forEach((user)Â =>Â {
Â Â Â Â constÂ playerContainerÂ =Â document.getElementById(user.uid);
Â Â Â Â playerContainerÂ &&Â playerContainer.remove();
Â Â });
Â Â awaitÂ rtc.client.leave();
};
</script>

<template>

Â Â Â Â <buttonÂ ref="joinBtn"Â @click="handleJoin"Â type="button"Â id="join">
Â Â Â Â Â Â åŠ å…¥
Â Â Â Â </button>
Â Â Â Â <buttonÂ ref="leaveBtn"Â @click="handleLeave"Â type="button"Â id="leave">

Â Â Â Â </button>

</template>
